  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92902</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92902</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Forces and motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte und Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces et mouvement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças e movimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze e movimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις και κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas y movimiento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This series of illustrations shows that moving an object requires a force greater than the force of friction between the object and the floor.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Push</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">unbalanced force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Reihe Abbildungen zeigt, daß das 
Verschieben einer Nachricht eine Kraft benötigt, die der Friktion 
zwischen der Nachricht und dem Fußboden grösser als die Kraft ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette série d'illustrations prouve que déplacer
un objet exige une force plus grande que la force du frottement entre 
l'objet et le plancher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta série das ilustrações mostra que mover um
objeto requer uma força mais grande do que a força da fricção 
entre o objeto e o assoalho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa serie di illustrazioni indica che spostare
un oggetto richiede una forza più grande della forza di attrito fra 
l'oggetto ed il pavimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η σειρά απεικονίσεων δείχνει ότι η κίνηση ενός
αντικειμένου απαιτεί μια δύναμη μεγαλύτερη από τη δύναμη της 
τριβής μεταξύ του αντικειμένου και του πατώματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta serie de ilustraciones muestra que la mudanza
de un objeto requiere una fuerza mayor que la fuerza de la fricción 
entre el objeto y el suelo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stoß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unausgeglichene Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frottement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poussée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force non équilibrée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fricção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Impulso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força desequilibrada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spinta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza unbalanced</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τριβή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ώθηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θιγμένη δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
